chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February, 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.

listitem.para: 1931 - Thursday. Gym & I was hot & bothered! Girl Reserve Cabinet meeting. Took Sally home. Studied etc tonight.
1932 - Sat. Watta day. In my room on account of foot. Letter from Bill! Thrills! Package from Boston. Everybody sweet to me. To Barn reception tonite with Sally Supplee, Louise Summers Ginny Trask!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Tennis with Dot Gorrell & Mudge. Studied. Fooled around & Betty & I went to see Mrs. Hobbs but she wasn't home. Birdie on sock(?) Eliot supper tonite in 2nd floor kitchenette. Ginny & I to Hale.
1934 - Mon. First of October! And I forgot to say Rabbit rabbit! German gets better & better. Studied a mite. Janet & I went to movies - "Madchen in Uniform" in German. Awfully good.

1935 - Tues. Heavy set of classes. Then right after lunch, played tennis match with W. Greenspan. Lost 603; 6-3. Bad! I was rotten! Tea at Barn at 6:30 & then Serenade Step-Singing tonite. Then Barn Mass Meeting & we had to make speeches from platform. I was scared.
1931 - Friday. Sewickley lost to Beaver 18-0. Dan took me to dance at gym tonite. Fun. I had to drive & am dead now.
1932 - Sun. Again, sat around all day. Fun with girls coming in & all. Supper downstairs. Not allowed to serve. Feast tonite. Jack Applegate, Ruth, Marjory, Marguerite, Ginny, Dobby & Betty. Fun
1933 - Mon. Tried out this evening for Soph cabaret. Am to be a witch. To libe afterwards but couldn't get book. Home & pretended to study. Am to sit at Mrs. Pascalâ€™s table 3 nites a week.
1934 - Tues. More classes & more lab. B.B. this aft & I keep getting lousier. Anyhow, Jeanne Washburn came for dinner & we messed about. Step Singing & then home & studied.

1935 - Wed. Zo. bldg. all day today. Miss Murphy swell this aft as we worked on rats etc. Killed one due to my dumbness. Then talked etc. S.P.C. meeting tonite. Miss Elliott nicer. Then home & tried to study!
1931 - Saturday. Rose late. Washed hair, stockings, Buddy, Casey & self. Read "Newcomer" by Thackeray & lessons etc. tonite.
1932 - Mon. Awful Physics lab. Went to visit Pinx. Over to Barn & to see Miss Jaques. Got a Banana Split tonite with Ruth & Betty. Fun. Bed early.

1933 - Tues. Barn tryouts this evening. I signed up for oodles of things. Probably won't make any. To libe again. I'm always there. Ginny & I to see Mlle. Malbot. She gave us tea. Darling & I still think she's grand!
1934 - Wed. 4 hours of lab. Then Prill, Dottie G. & I to A.K.X & Z.A. teas. Both awfully nice. We had great talks. Studied quite a bit tonite what with lessons piling up. Wish Bill'd write!

1935 - Thurs. Up & first roll call in Chemistry today. Bells at noon. Then German this aft. Then Agora tea for Juniors & Seniors. More darn fun! Then cleaned up. Fairbanks our new House Pres.! Oh di. It's so grand, I feel almost as if I'd won something!
1931 - Sunday. Church & lessons. S.S.. Bill, Dan & I to Brook's Folly. Ghosts to people who came. Keen view. Awful walls. Supper at S's & Jim down later.
1932 - Tues. Up to Personnel Bureau. To libe. Zoology fun. Knitted. Pillow fight tonite with Betty & Marguerite. Studied. Letters. Bed early, I hope.
1933 - Wed. Hair cut this aft & to Music Box to see about radio. Wrote Sally. B.B. & hockey this aft. Both a little better. Dobby's a grand egg. I see Ruth P. & Pinx every time. Studied tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Handed in 1st drawings to Miss Murphy. Dottie G, Carol Kulp & I to Agora & T.Z.E. teas. Impressed with Agora. But I won't get up my hopes. Sat at Miss McElroy's table.

1935 - Fri. Worked in Chem bldg. Then home this aft till 4:30. May Prop tryouts brot in. Then to b.b. & gosh, it was fun, di!! I love it so! Jeanne Wysor for dinner & she is just so nice! Studied tonite & bed late.
1931 - Monday. No current events. Cabinet meeting at noon. Studied & read tonight.
1932 - Wed. To recital tonite with Ginny Trask & Dolly Edmond. Fun. Crazy boys who turned out to be Bee's brother & friend. Oh gosh! Fun & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. More fun in Zo. Hate old Bible. Mess about Physics. Did French & went to libe. Class meeting about songs. Rained tonite & I studied & fooled with Pril Donnell & Andy.
1934 - Fri. No lab today. Grand feeling. Fooled in Prill's room etc. till b.b. Betty Richmond for dinner & then to Step Singing. First time I've sat on Junior steps.

1935 - Sat. Classes. Worked at Chem bldg. Here all aft & fooled around. Then in on 4:57 with Prill & NP. Then met Fairbanks at Touraine. Dinner at Jacob Winth's Then walk thru park. To Schubert to see "Jubilee" - awfully good. Home Bed late.
1931 - Tuesday. Drove with Sally this aft. Home & studied & read "Newcomer" tonite.
1932 - Thurs. Mrs. Hobbs is my faculty advisor. I like her heaps. Studied parameciums this aft. Messed around & studied tonite.
1933 - Fri. Tennis this aft with Ruth Nicholson. Tournament. She won 4-6, 6-3, 6-4. More darn fun. I hope I can play her again. Libe tonite after Step Singing to try out for Barn. Hope I make it!
1934 - Sat. No town today because it rained guns. Toasted marshmellows etc. this aft & tonite Andy, Dolly & I to moves "Treasure Island." Fun. Home. Bed. Tony on grand date. Prill out, etc.

1935 - Sun. Up at 9:15. Wynfred Fox had a breakfast then corridor breakfast. Then learned Indian songs & dances from Marion Roe-Cloud. Dinner with Fairbanks & guest. Betty Crawford. Wrote letters etc. Picked leaves with Janet. Supper & Vespers at Agora. Fun! 8 of us! Then home - Major Bowes & studied.
1931 - Wednesday. Fun with Sally this aft. Tonight I studied & wrote letters. To bed rather late.
1932 - Fri. Letters. B.B. in aft & I had to play against Jane Loomis, head of sport. Good egg. Made a basket. Subbed tonite at dinner. Studied not at all. Talked & knitted & bed early.
1933 - Sat. Chem lab & I finished early. Practice for next week's cabaret. Fun. To Hathaway. Party tonite here at Munger. Grand fun. Danced. Sang. Ate & played games. Mrs. Paschal is a dear!
1934 - Sun. Up late. Read d- Education Book. Dinner with gang. Read this aft. Walk around lake with Peanut & Sandy. German tonite & much fooling. Bed early. Wish I were home!

1935 - Mon. Worked in Chem bldg. Heredity. Then Chem lab this aft. Fun. Archery & I was lousy - 168. Home & dinner. Meeting of Barn at Chappas(?). Home & called Munsy. Swell talk & it was so grand to hear her voice once again! Finally bed & thot of home!
1931 - Thursday. Girl Reserve Bldg & Girl Party. I was boy. Sally & I almost won Waltz prize. I nearly fell over. Lots of fun. Good eats. Pres. of Latin Club.

1932 - Sat. Awful old classes. Finally 2 o'clock came & Honey, Bee Short & I to Boston, Cambridge. Got Nadine. To Boston to Met - "One Way Passage." Dugin Parks for Supper. Grand. Soph. serenade. Keen. Bed!!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Ate crackers. Breakfast at Hole with Dolly & Carter. Congr. church. O.K. Drug store for junk for eye. Bells 5:30 - 10:00. horrible! Tea at 5 by Seniors. M.K. Britten & Apple Leich keen girls.
1934 - Mon. Classes again. Always hound us. But I finished up work & tonite Keown, Sandy & I went to Natick to see "British Agent." O.K.! I like Leslie Howard. Had Sauterne. Home & tired!

1935 - Tues. Cut in Chem. German O.K. Then B.B. this aft & loads of fun after work in Chem. bldg. Then to Steve's at Cag(?) for dinner. Met Miss Lyman. She's awfully nice! Mrs Holder came in & we all talked. To Chem. lecture. Then House Meeting & Fairbanks presided & did a swell job!
1931 - Friday. Saw Aunt Hat at Emericks. Town with Munny to see J. Harold Murray in "East Wind." I cried. Good! Saw S.S. & Jim F., Mr. & Mrs. Smart! Foggy.
1932 - Sunday. Up & ate at Hole in Wall. Chapel. Libe in aft. Studied. Out after supper for brief walk with girls. Back. Studied. Guests. Studied some more & bed early, I hope.
1933 - Mon. Classes again. To vil & to infirmary about eye. Better. Nominated. Basketball this aft & I got more into swing. Read for French. Studied all evening. Bed early.

1934 - Tues. B.B. this aft & got along better. Kilbon & I clicked. Miss Murphy, Miss Leach, Steve, Dobby, Fairbanks, Caton & I for dinner. More darn fun! Silly as heck. They stayed late so I bedded early & hope for best.

1935 - Wed. Zo. all day. The expt. worked swelly today! The to Agora at 5:30 for Hall(?) Party! Awful. Then A.A. meeting & di, I'm a member of the Blazer Committee. Oh di! If it would only come about! Home & studied till late.
1931 - Saturday. Town in a.m. & bo't stuff. Freedom game this aft. We lost 6-0. Sally's for supper. Jim C. Dan & Bill down. Jim & I won at Michigan. Bed at Sally's.

1932 - Mon. More schedules to make out. Physics lab & actually did something. Found out Mrs. Hobbs is my faculty advisor. Awfully nice. To libe tonite with Dolly Edmund. Keen nite & moon. I miss Bill!
1933 - Tues. Fell in chair in Zo. Crazy! Awful French & I had to talk. Vil with Peanut. Dinner with Dobby. Discussed religion. Not nominated this year. Tough. But does it matter?

1934 - Wed. Up at 5:45 to finish studying. Quiz in German. 1st of year. Miss Sallditt swell! Lab this aft for 4hrs. & I was done out. Home & Prill & I talked. To Fiske after dinner. Home. Studied. Bed before 10.

1935 - Thurs. Lived thru the awful classes & prob. flunked a roll-call. Then Archery - 195 & German this aft. Then vill & hair cut etc. To libe tonite & Zo libe to work. Home. Packed! Letters & bed late. Hooray for tomorrow!
1931 - Sunday. Church & went to see Mr. & Mrs. Averill. To caves this aft at W.W. Park. Dan, Jim, Bill, Sally & I. Dinner at Smarts. Michigan afterwards & home 9:30.

1932 - Tues. Mrs. Hobbs called on me while sleeping. Again mentioned (Somebody) Jennings, studier of parmamecium. Made temp. captain of a team in b.b. Pinx, Ruth P. & I supper at Severance. Nice. Step-singing. (with Sophomores). Feast tonite at Marguerite's room. Fun!
1933 - Wed. Primaries today. Went to Infirmary for a nightgown. Silly act of Dolly's & mine. Fooled in Pril's room tonite & did Bible. Quizes next week. Lovely. This is next Mon. & I'm tired. G'nite.

1934 - Thurs. Crossed off all but Recording Sec'y. But, first elections today & I lost in finals. Prill Metcalf got it. Beth Brogue new pres. & she'll be O.K. Tea this aft. Studied hard tonite but didn't finish. Up at 6 tomorrow. 'Nite!

1935 - Fri. Oh my! Work in chem bldg. Cut in Heredity - off at last to Brattleboro on 12:55. Arrived Brattleboro at 7. Marion met us. Dinner & Mrs. Fairbanks is so nice. Movies, then eats & home & talked & bed late!
1931 - Monday. Sally & I, also Jim F rode hither & yon this aft. Bowled tonite with Mummer. She won 4 & I won 2. Wrote letters tonite.
1932 - Wed. To movies this aft at Wellesley Hills with Betty & Ginny Trask. Fun. Studied & pile of girls came in tonite. No letters because I finished lessons. Passed motor test.

1933 - Thurs. Peanut & I sitting peacefully when radio men arrived. Cute. Couldn't do much. More studying & probably went to vil for something or other. Studied & as usual - bed. Awful roll-call. M. Schoenfuss is our president! Thrills! Whitehead, Forsythe, Ellie Smith, etc. Grand!

1934 - Fri. Officers announced. Betty Brazee swell president! Felt sort of awful! No lab! Slept this aft & then b.b. but it was too cold for any fun! To Betty Richmond's for dinner. Swell gang in her house. To libe & home late. Prill & Tony & talked about virgins(?) etc. Very enlightening. or (?)??

1935 - Sat. Up late! What joy! Betty & Marion & I picnicked out on a swell hill overlooking river after Fairbanks & I went driving. Then to see Mrs. Kendall & she is perfectly grand, like Mrs. Hobbs. Home & off to Northfield - Francis Nevin. Back. Talked with Mrs. Fairbanks. To town & ate with Fitly(?) & Marion.
1931 - Tuesday. Studied & raked leaves this aft. Movies with Libby Rye "Transatlantic" tonite. Good! Washed hair & wrote letters.
1932 - Thurs. As usual - fun in Zoology. Came home & studied, knitted & read. Waited on dinner. House meeting tonite.
1933 - Fri. the 13th. But nothing awful happened. Practice for Cabaret tonite at 7:15 & stayed till 8:30 or later. Home & just fooled around instead of studying. Bible still awful.

1934 - Sat. More rain & great amt of snow! in a.m. Didn't go to Boston. Vill with Prill. Studied. Gang dinner. Betty & I to hole, then Schoenfuss, Sandy, Peanut, Betty & I cheese dreams etc - great fun Wish I were home to see Bill!!

1935 - Sun. Up late! Read & lounged in pajamas. Then to see Mr. & Mrs. Merrifield. Grand dinner, but Marion had taken Fitly(?) away. People came in & then we had to leave at 5. Had such a grand time! Like Mrs. Fairbanks heaps & Marion. Back on bus home on 11:35. Tired but happy!
1931 - Wednesday. Fooled with Sally this aft. Studied. Bowled tonite with Munny. She beat me. Letters & you tonite.
1932 - Fri. Peps beat the Jitters 3-2. What fun. Played to see who would be on squad. Hope. Hope. Studied a bit & messed around after dinner at Sarah's. Fun. Step singing.
1933 - Sat. Lab & got out early. Practice for Cabaret this aft. Dumb. Waited supper. Cabaret. Witch & Dolly's & my act. More fun! Dancing & eats. Home & talked it over. Bed in Betty's bed. Tired.

1934 - Sun. Slept till 8:30. So swell. 8 of us then got breakfast, orange juice, Eng. muffins & coffee. Swell! Read paper. Chubby Cutler here for dinner, 4. Then studied again for sever quizes for the week.
1935 - Mon. Hard to get up. But to Chem bldg & worked. Then Heredity. Chem lab. all aft. Archery & I was tired & lousy. (?) tonite copying Saturdays notes & doing Sat. & tomorrow's reading!
1931 - Thursday. Chapel today. Jim Crooks. Bill & Jim were all on. Studied & read tonite.

1932 - Sat. Went to libe & got a book. Came home & read. Freshman serenade tonite. Cute green lanterns. Back & to Alumnae for Cabaret. Danced with Pinx, Sarah, Ruth & Rosemary. Fun. Found out I was on basketball squad.
1933 - Sun. Up late. M. Schoenfuss, Peanut & I breakfasted in kitchenette. Studied. Long walk this aft to football game (Peanut & I) Mrs. Trask & Betsy came. To Bobby's. Waited supper. Studied. Bed.

1934 - Mon. Twins arrived! Wilhelm & Wilhelmina. My, such exuberance, but not like last year. Terrible time in Chem lab. I almost got cross. Prill & I to Fisks for dinner. Officers announced. Pres. Eda Fleming. Sec. Treas. Mary Selgaarde(?).

1935 - Tues. Still getting caught up. Knew nothing in Chemistry & Miss French wouldn't postpone quiz. Then b.b. this aft & clicked beautifully with Kilbon. Tonite dinner at Agora & found out my children are "Dempy" Demplewolff & Betty Gregg. So exciting & such a grand supper!
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. lost to Bellevue 6-0. S.H.S. better. I took Shirley, Peg Handy & Jane Terry. Rain etc. & eats at Bakery. Fun.
1932 - Sun. Up at 8:30. Read & wrote English theme. Studied till 4:30. Down by lake. So peaceful. Back & to chapel tonite. Home, studied & bed.
1933 - Mon. Classes. Made property committee. Thrills! Letter from Munny. Laundry & cute pictures. B.B & I'm sure not to make 1st team. Oh dear! Hockey awful! Am I a flop?

1934 - Tues. Lived in agony all day with Prill, but got no mail. But we still don't dare think we made a society! Got guinea pig in Phys. So cute. Named it Rosemary. Awful quiz which I flunked. What a person!

1935 - Wed. Wotta day. Pinned roses on Dempy & Betty Gregg. More fun! So exciting. Saw Miss Elliott. Did Zo expt all aft. Then, Initiation dinner at 1812 House tonite & more fun. The new bunch is simply grand! Oh gosh di, it is swell.
1931 - Saturday. Stayed home all day & cut out pajamas. What a job. Did lessons & washed some stockings.

1932 - Mon. B.B. practice this aft. Played center 3 times. Wotta life. Speech recital tonite. Wilfred Walter & Catherine Lacey. Good. Betty & Marguerite went to Marguerite's & to Boston. Suckers. Bed on time. Speech Recital.

1933 - Tues. To vil with Peanut & got some food, etc. To Stoney's for dinner with M. Schoenfuss, Bee Short, Tillie Bicknell & Helen Wadsworth. Swell time. Home & studied for Psyc. quiz tomorrow. Great life!

1934 - Roll Call in German & then Ruth Barnefield, pres. of Agora came up & gave me roses! I was up in heaven! Oh me. Swell initiation supper (Mr. Harod (?) & Mrs. McCarthy.) Home & Mother had called. Dammuddy died at 7:30. It's best, di, but oh gosh, how awful! I'll never, never see her again until ?

1935 - Thurs. Up at 5. Studied frantically for Chem quiz. Also did German. Quiz was pretty bad. Then bells, Archery, talk in German class, meeting of Props committee, fixing of schedules, studying at Zo libe & up till 12:45 doing those charts.
1931 - Sunday. Went down to Sally's. Stayed for supper. She has been sick but is better. Good for her! Church with Munny.
1932 - Tues. Rained all day. Wotta life. B.B. quiz in aft. Home. Changed clothes 3 times. Wrote awful criticism of Speech Recital. Bed on time. How wonderful. Training, you know.

1933 - Wed. Letter from John. Mother arrived this aft! Can you imagine? Swell! We walked over campus. She met kids. She & Peanut & I to Boston. Met Pop. Dinner at Copley & was it swell? Oh me! So grand to see them!
1934 - Thurs. Can't get over being in a society! And I can't get used to not having Dammuddy. Called family tonite & talked to John, Mom 'n' Pop. It was so swell. I wish I were home!.

1935 - Fri. Up & did some Heredity. Then work at Chem bldg. Heredity & I was tired! To lunch with Miss Elliott at Horton. Miss Beall came, too! More fun. Talked about S.O.C. To First Nat. 1 ordered for Agora. Mr. Hopkins swell. Home. Slept. B.B. & I took charge. B. Richmond for dinner & whole gang of us went to Wellesley movie tonite. Good!
1931 - Monday. Girl Reserve meeting after school. Took Sally home. Studied as usual tonite.
1932 - Wed. Rain & more rain. How discouraging. Went all the way over to basketball to discover that I didn't have to go. Wrote letters, slept, knitted & read. Bye & g'nite!

1933 - Thurs. Lived thru class. Town & Met Munny & Pop. Mother & I to Seville & then shopped. Wrap & china dishes! Talked at hotel. (It's all like a dream!) They left on boat. Home & attempted to study tonite. Oh me! Priscilla is so nice!

1934 - Fri. Up early & studied German & Chem. B- in German roll call. Chem not so bad. To libe & then B.B. & it was swell today. Miss Beall said nice things. To Zo libe tonite. Steve, Miss Murphy, Miss Leach. More darn fun! Gosh, I like them! Dammuddy's funeral at 3. Sat in libe & thought. Wrote Munny at 4.

1935 - Sat. Up at 5. German theme. Classes. Studied in Zo libe this aft. Home after Prep. at Agora. Then tonite - all dressed in formals, formal initiation. Such fun, di! 2 daughters, Dempy & Betty were so grand. Ceremony very impressive & I almost felt like weeping Barny & Ginny K. back & loads of fun!
1931 - Tuesday. Fooled around. Raked leaves this aft & bowled tonight with Munny. We both made 95. Our best scores yet.
1932 - Thurs. Still more rain. Basketball supper tonite but no teams announced on account of the rain. Good eats. Down to vil & bought grapes with R. Keown. Home. Bed early.
1933 - Fri. 2 quizes. What ho. Made up hockey. Miss Ward of Eva La Galliennne Co. talked to Barn. Wonderful. Stanley called. Home! Props meeting. Dobby's for Bible stuff. Party in my room & bed late.

1934 - Sat. In a turmoil all day with work. Finally tonite, 7:30 Initiation service. Oh gosh di! Never has anything impressed me more. Roses, candles, corsage pins, hand shake & Barny's swell! Home & spread. Prill & Melvin about.

1935 - Sun. Up early. Agora breakfast. Not enough. Then chapel. Dr. Boynton Merrill. good! Dinner & Marion Roe-Cloud spoke! Art came about three. Tennis & 2-6, 6-4, 6-4, he won. I owed him a movie. We went to Old France for dinner & then to Met & saw "Hands Across the Table." Prill certainly acted funny. I suppose (?) it will happen as I think Art is terribly nice. I like him loads.
1931 - Wednesday. Just a usual school day. Took Sally home in aft. Studied. Bowled with Mother tonight. I got 88 & she got 95 again!
1932 - Fri. B.B. practice in aft, which grew into teams. Am a sub on the 1st team & a regular center on the 2nd. I'm so glad. I attend all the games. Studied tonite & washed hair. Pete here.

1933 - Sat. To Boston. Shopped. Met Dobby & Hat Qua , also Mary Raymond. Museum for Zo. Dinner at Seville. Fooled & then to Plymouth theatre & saw "The Late Christopher Bean." Right good. Tired. Home. Bed. Late!

1934 - Sun. To Agora for swell breakfast. Back & studied. I was elected Ass't Purveyor. Get teas! Vespers tonite at 6 & had to be nice to faculty. Like Barny heaps. Miss Murphy here for dinner. She's swell! Wrote Ed. paper tonite till all hours. Oh me!

1935 - Mon. Up early & studied. Worked at Chem Bldg. Heredity. Chem lab & Archery in aft. Blazer Com. meeting tonite. S.O.C. meeting. Barely home & Mom called. Too perfect di! I talked with Bill & it was heavenly! Can hardly believe it. Oh gosh di, I really love him so much. Wasn't Munny awfully nice & grand to me?
1931 - Thursday. Studied in aft. Girl Reserves & "Sporting Blood" with Sally tonite. Peachy! I cried. More lessons & bed late.
1932 - Sat. Awful classes in morning. Nap & fixed nails etc. for dance (Fall Informals) tonite with Stanley & Bick Long & Betty. More darn fun! Home late after a perfect nite. Howe, Sullivan. Keen.
1933 - Sun. Up late. Aroused by noise. Wrote letters & studied in a.m. Studied this aft. Making up lost time. To Ruth's for dinner. Sewickley gang there. Talked it all over. What fun!
1934 - Mon. To see E. Pease tonite & also Mama Barnefield about teas & Vespers. Foold(?) away much time! To see Hat & Eunice about our future party. Home. Bed late.

1935 - Tues. Sort of walked on air today. Metabolism quiz & I hope I got thru it o.k.!! Pooed(?) out when I came to Chemistry & consequently knew nothing! What a life. Tore about this aft & went to B.B. at 4:40. It's a grand sport di! I like Miss Beall & B.B. even if I can't attain perfection!
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. beat Arnold Prep 12-0. Whoopie! I'm on Honor Roll. Jim & I only Seniors! Party at Sally's. Dan & Bill took me. I was as usual silly.

1932 - Sun. Up at 9:30. Read Ramuntcho. Studied. Walk with Mudge this aft. She certainly has a lot of character. To faculty (?) Mrs. Hobs for dinner. B. Cutler & I & Speech. Pretty. I like Mrs. Hobbs an awful lot!
1933 - Mon. To Barn & painted blue stools. B.B. & I actually was better against A.A. However, only made 2nd team as announced at b.b. supper. Afterwards home & studied.
1934 - Tues. Beginning to understand some Zo. B.B. dinner tonite. I had to order More fun. I also ordered for Agora tea. To see Mother afterwards & got knitting from E. Pease. Oh me!
1935 - Wed. Technical rehearsal tonite & most of the kids had the right props. They're all grand wonders, di. And then home at 10 & studied, always the same, almost. What a life, di!
1931 - Saturday. Town, coat, raincoat, hat & 2 pr. shoes. Yummy coat!! Worked in aft. Party tonite, Sally, Charlotte, Bill J. Dan & Jim F. Fun!
1932 - Mon. B.B. in aft but I didn't get to play. Timed. Freshmen won 34-14. Beat Sophomores. Studied tonite & bed early. Great to be living. Thought of Bill!
1933 - Tues. Good old Zo. Then Bible & French & I was awful. Bible quiz. To Hathaway in rain for props. Dot Fagg's for supper & we had keen time. Home & on bells & studied till late.
1934 - Wed. Out of lab a mite early. B.B. game with Sophs & we lost 16-14 - very disheartening! But better luck next time! Agora picture tonite & I was a sight. Barny crazy as heck. Home. Studied.

1935 - Thurs. Went around in aft collecting forgotten articles with Miggie, after Archery & German. What a day of German is Thursday. Studied a mite tonite. Still thrilled about Mon. nite! Gosh, Bill is the one - but am I? Who knows!
1931 - Sunday. I nearly fainted when coming home from church, I found Bill here. Walked to Crutchy's. Knee hurt! Stayed for supper. Alvin & Paul Barber brot me home.
1932 - Tues. Game with 2nd team Sophs. They beat us 22-5. I was rotten! Not much hope for me. I was elected captain of the team. (I wish Bill would write. Gee! I like him so much!)
1933 - Wed. Soph IIs beat Freshmen 20-18 in a game full of fouls & cold! Brr! Rehearsal for Props tonite & I barely got studying done. Oh me! To vil & got A.H. a present & sent it to her.
1934 - Thurs. More lab etc & more hurried studying. To Shakespeare this aft for baseball & lacrosse picture. Barny there & again silly. Oh me! Studied German till all hours. Then Education.

1935 - Fri. Class after Chem. work. Then over to Barn * then B.B. at 4:40. Barn for supper & Dress Rehearsal tonight. Went off O.K. except for picture in "Bird in Hand" which fell down during play! Home at 11 & bed late!
1931 - Monday. Walked to Glen Osborne with Sally. Ice cream cones. Mrs. Townsend & Bob here! Washed hair & studied & wrote letters & read.
1932 - Wed. Got Mrs. Hobbs a plant. Fun. Got a rose & loads of kids thought I was really in T.Z.E. What fun! Took shoes to be soled. Wrote 5 letters. Late to gym. Studied & bed early.
1933 - Thurs. Up at 5:30 to study! Awful Zo roll-call. Barn Dress Rehearsal tonite. Went at 5:30 for supper & stayed till late. Oh me! When is there time for everything.

1934 - Fri. Classes etc till 1:30. Fed Rosemary. To Vill 2 times for Barn! Over to Alum at 3:30 & was there till 11:00. Technical & dress rehearsal. Miss Gallagher swell. Home. Exhausted. But what fun!

1935 - Sat. Cut German & off to Mt. Holyoke with Miss Schraeder & Mary Cralius. Play Day. Wheaton also. Met swell girls! Played Speed ball for 1st time. Then tea at S.A.Hall. Home & Miss Schraeder raved about Munger girls & money etc. To Barn & Informals came off. Greg Van Nest did excellent job! All over & I got the swellest corsage. Gosh! I they're so nice!!
1931 - Tuesday. Dinner, studied & all nite at Sally's. Bill took her to movies. I had seen it. Bed early, but we talked late. Aunt Hat's birthday.
1932 - Thurs. Rain all day. 2 letters. Got shoes. A- in Zoo roll call. Ate dinner with Honey. Loads of fun. Got news. Studied tonite & bed early. Ruth Keown home overnite!
1933 - Fri. Caught up on some studying. Cut lit. Trying out for News. Called Stanley tonite & told him to go with Peanut to Informals. Studied & generally arrange everybody. G'nite.

1934 - Sat. Slept till 8:30. Vill. Haircut. Got junk. Home. Job. To Zo lab & fixed R.m. Studied. Barn at 3 & stayed till 11:30. Fun, tho. Ginny not there & so we had charge. - Seeley most. Loads of fun. Dead tired!

1935 - Sun. Up for corridor breakfast. Then 10:30 Barn people & Hickey Clark off to cabin - Outing Club. Merrill Mills & I cooked while other swam. The luckies. Home & attempted to study. But then Agora Vespers & food was o.k. this time, I guess.
1931 - Wednesday - Staff Meeting of Oracle after school. I'm a Senior Reporter. Fred. Smart is also on. Bowled tonite. Mad 95 again. Ma 55!!!
1932 - Friday. Another b.b. game. Have forgotten score, but I seem to have left out this page for some unknown reason (Dec. 1).

1933 - Sat. Lab awful. Hair-cut etc. this aft. Barn at 5:30 & worked on plays till 10:15. Rushed home & dressed. Dance. Stanley good. Roommate Dick Lee nice. Mr. Epstein awfully nice! Ginny a pal. Bed late Apple & Peanut, (?)

1934 - Sun. Up late. Corridor breakfast. Fun! Then studied a bit. After dinner Art Keown came & took Ruth & Fairbanks & I home. More fun. Read "Flush" tonite & Art read too. Swell food. So grand to be in a home again! Radio. Bed not late.

1935 - Mon. A.A. meeting tonite at office after B.B. dinner after a day of Chem. work. Heredity, Chem lab & a bit of attempted study. Home & did a bit of worrying about S.R.C. Will everything end o.k.? Oh well. Where do lessons come in? Wavie our captain. At last di - she beat me & I'm glad after S.P.C. & Blazer situation!! Team - Childs, Whitehead, Custiss, Butsch, Kilbon & me. Fun!
1931 - Thursday. Gave Jim Oracle stuff. Piles of lessons tonite. Couldn't go to Girl Reserves. Played basketball in gym. Dancing nest week! Heck!
1932 - Sat. Helped decorate for Halloween party. Went tonite. Had supper, cider, too & danced & had keen time. Bed late after loads of fun. Took a pumpkin.

1933 - Sun. Up late. Breakfast tea & cookies. Studied. Hat Qua for lunch. We tore off to Boston. Museums again. Drunk man in subway. Home to wait on supper. Studied all evening. Ate in Prill's room. Bed.
1934 - Mon. Cut Ed. & got here about 9. Mr. Keown drove us back. Such a swell time. Awful to get back. Keowns are swell. Lab this aft & then studied like heck after taking props back to vil.

1935 - Tues. Tore about hither & yon. Did some work in the Chem bldg. Archery at 1:40. Felt not one bit like working. A fine evening - Movies in evening with Mudge, Fairbanks & Peanut. Home. Bed late.
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. beat Avalon 12-0. Certainly was keen. Movies tonite, Bill, Dan, Sally & I. To Dan's afterward. Home 11. Bed about 12.
1932 - Sun. Up late & messed around. Church. Ride on bicycle with Franny to Wellesley Hills & saw football game. Home, ate & had supper. Young People's Meeting. Home. Studied. Bed early.
1933 - Mon. Scored b.b. game. Sophs beat Freshmen 1sts 30-16. Great game. Coffee with Mrs. Paschal after dinner with Dolly & guest. To see Mrs. Hobbs with Betty. Not there. Box package from home.

1934 - Tues. Finally finished French. Worked about. Bells & wrote Munny. Lab this aft & Rosemary lost plenty. To see Eunice & Hat about tomorrow. Agora to see Mother B. but not in. Did German with Dorris Babbidge. B.B. game - beat Seniors 19-15.

1935 - Wed. Oh di, I must confess I haven't kept you up to date! Miss Schraeder came for dinner tonite. She is nice. I like her heaps! Then to Agora for Bus. meeting & di, I'm so sad! I had too many points & so am no longer purveyor! Oh dear! But Prill is! So it's still sort of in the family!
1931 - Saturday. Halowe'en. Jim Crooks, Bricky, Dan, Jim F., Bill, Shirley & I to parade. Fell & sprained ankle on way to Sally's. (?) I can't help it. Darn it!! I do!!!
1932 - Mon. Freshman 2nd beat Juniors 24-12 in a keen game. On our toes today. Forgotten what else happened. Got sundae with Ruth & Dolly tonite at Liggetts.
1933 - Tues. Horrid classes. Barn for stuff I had gotten. Couldn't find vial. Hallowe'en party tonite. Good eats. Fun dancing. Very nice time & to end it all I came up & studied! Thrills.

1934 - Wed. Classes etc. A- on German Roll Call. To vil for Agora tea. Then Eunice Avery, Kitty Ruff & I made Hal at Alum. & strung him from Green Tower. Scary and spooky, but more fun! Party by Janet West tonite. More fun.

1935 - Hallowe'en! Appointment with Miss Beall in a.m. about Indoor basketball. It's going to start a week earlier. Then B.B. game this aft, 1st of season. We beat Freshmen 29-11 or something. A grand game, but Kilbon fell & hurt her back. Gosh! It was bad. Party at Munger. Then Janet & I to Zo bldg. & counted flies etc. Felt funny - so home & bed early.
